item.title: Ginny, Part 1
item.description: A nerdy high school boy suddenly scores but his family moves. Little does he know that he actually became a dad! Years later his high school sweet heart finds him and he reconnects with her and her daughter. The daughter needs her daddy--needs him more than he was willing to admit at first.

item.title: Daisy's Diary - I Helped my Daddy at the Camera Club
item.description: Hi there, I'm Daisy, today I had a great day with my Daddy helping out at his Camera Club, so I'm going to write all about it in my diary so I don't forget. I always forget stuff, Daddy says I'm a silly dumb blonde girl but I don't mind because he always gives me a really big hug when he says it.

item.title: Getting to Know Step-Mother, Part 1
item.description: Barbara learns quickly that her step-mother and step-brother are cruel and devious. Things get even worse after her father dies. She soon realizes that she is doomed to a life of pain and suffering.

item.title: Kira
item.description: A man falls head-over-heels in love with a 14-year-old girl and they have a brief sexual relationship; she returns at 17 to live with him and his new wife as a boarder. Plenty of mushy love but even more sloppy sex! Hope you like it.
